title: ZincObserve
desc: ZincObserve is a cloud-based observability platform that allows you to monitor logs, metrics, and traces efficiently. It utilizes a unique approach to data storage and indexing, which stores un-indexed data in a compressed format, resulting in upto 140 times lower storage costs.

heroSection.title: ZincObserve
heroSection.subtitle: ZincObserve is a cloud-based observability platform that allows you to monitor logs, metrics, and traces efficiently. It utilizes a unique approach to data storage and indexing, which stores un-indexed data in a compressed format, resulting in upto 140 times lower storage costs.ZincObserve's analytics capabilities can turn vast amounts of data into meaningful insights, and its user-defined ingest and query functions based on Lua scripting language provide unparalleled control over observability data.

details.title: Double the productivity with ZincObserve
details.desc:
The search-around logs data feature enables easy identification and fixing of issues in your system. ZincObserve offers customized log searches, scheduled and real-time alerts, and template-based alert targeting that allows dispatching alerts seamlessly to multiple platforms such as Slack and Teams. ZincObserve is equipped with high availability and clustering capabilities that ensure data is always accessible. It provides multiple language options and prebuilt binaries and container images for optimized processing. ZincObserve strikes a balance between storage efficiency and search performance, making it an ideal choice for high-tech professionals looking for a powerful observability platform that can help them unlock the full potential of their systems.

With ZincObserve, users can quickly identify and fix issues in their applications through real-time monitoring and alerts. The platform's intuitive user interface and customizable dashboards provide a clear and holistic view of application performance, enabling proactive management of system health. ZincObserve is a reliable and efficient observability platform that delivers superior performance and cost savings, making it an ideal choice for high-tech professionals looking to optimize their application observability.

content.title: ZincObserve Features
content.subtitle: Discover the Game-Changing Features of ZincObserve:

items.title: Full-stack observability Solution
items.desc: Don't let your logs go unnoticed. ZincObserve offers a search-around logs data feature that allows you to easily identify and fix any issues in your system. Advanced embedded GUI and Features like top 10, search around, SQL for query and custom VRL (Vector Remap Language) functions for searching logs allows finding logs of significance super fast.

items.title: Highly compressed data storage
items.desc: ZincObserve leverages a unique approach to data storage and indexing that eschews reliance on indexing altogether. Instead, it stores un-indexed data in a compressed format, utilizing local disk or object storage in parquet columnar format. This strategy minimizes the compute requirements during data ingestion and results in highly efficient compression rates, translating into approximately upto 140 times lower storage costs.

items.title: Accelerate performance
items.desc: ZincObserve is a cutting-edge observability platform designed for the cloud that allows you to monitor your logs, metrics, and traces with ease. While ZincObserve's approach to data storage and indexing may be different from usual observability tools, full scan searches remain highly efficient due to the implementation of multiple optimization techniques, such as partitioning and caching.

items.title: Comprehensive alerting mechanisms
items.desc: With scheduled and real-time alerts, you can stay on top of critical problems as they happen. This means that you can quickly address any issues and keep your systems running smoothly.  Additionally, it offers template-based alert targeting, enabling users to dispatch alerts seamlessly to multiple platforms such as Slack and Teams, among others. This feature enhances the user's system monitoring capabilities, enabling them to proactively track and manage their system's health.

items.title: Advanced Data Analysis
items.desc: With ZincObserve, dashboards can display data from logs, metrics, and traces, providing a complete picture of system behavior. They provide a visual representation of real-time data, allowing users to quickly understand the health and performance of their systems.

features.title: ZincObserve Features
features.subtitle: Explore the transformative functionalities of ZincObserve and experience a new level of data observation

items.title: Logs
items.desc: Provides a search-around logs data feature within logs data to quickly detect and resolve system issues.

items.title: SQL based query language
items.desc: Offers SQL query language support to make your search efficient.

items.title: Alerts
items.desc: Provides scheduled and real-time alerts that allow users to promptly address critical issues and dispatch alerts to multiple platforms using templates, which improves system monitoring capabilities.

items.title: Dashboards
items.desc: Dashboards provide a comprehensive view of system behavior by presenting real-time data from logs, metrics, and traces in a visually appealing and efficient manner.

items.title: Data Storage
items.desc: Provides Storage functionality support in local Disk, s3, MinIO, GCS

items.title: Dynamic Schema Evolution
items.desc: Supports dynamic schema evolution that allows for seamless modification of data schemas without downtime.

items.title: Security
items.desc: Provides out of the box authentication methods to secure access to the platform.

items.title: Advanced GUI
items.desc: Provides a user-friendly and intuitive graphical user interface for easier navigation and use of the platform.

items.title: User defined Ingest & Query functions
items.desc: Offers efficient data analysis by transforming large datasets into valuable insights while enabling users to customize ingestion and querying functions using the Lua scripting language.

items.title: Traces Under Development
items.desc: Helps to troubleshoot performance issues easily in your microservices architecture.

items.title: Metrics Under Development
items.desc: Long-term storage for Prometheus metrics in S3 with support for SQL and PromQL.
